definition: four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky

sentences.english: Four brilliant poets in Yongjia are members of a poetic school during the South Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: “永嘉四靈”是南宋時期的一個詩歌流派。

definition: old but still full of vitality (idiom)
variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
General Yuchi Gong (585-658), famous military man instrumental in founding the Tang dynasty
(of a political career) everything is going smoothly (idiom)
variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
ribbon (as a decoration)/cordon (diagonal belt worn as a sign of office or honor)
set of bells (old Chinese music instrument)
luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle
